Uses of Package
com.mercadopago.resources

  • Packages that use com.mercadopago.resources 
    Package Description
    com.mercadopago.resources  
  • Classes in com.mercadopago.resources used by com.mercadopago.resources 
    Class and Description
    AdvancedPayment
    Provides a solution for Marketplace payments where the business model requires splitting money between multiple sellers
    Card
    The cards class is the way to store card data of your customers safely to improve the shopping experience.
    CardToken
    This class will allow you to send your customers card data for Mercado Pago server and receive a token to complete the payments transactions.
    Customer
    This class allows you to store customers data safely to improve the shopping experience.
    Disbursement
    Payment for the seller
    DisbursementRefund
    Disbursement refund data
    DiscountCampaign
    This resource allows you to find current valid discount campaigns
    MerchantOrder
    This class will allow you to create and manage your orders.
    OAuth 
    Payment
    This class provides the methods to access the API that will allow you to create your own payment experience on your website.
    Payment.CurrencyId 
    Payment.OperationType 
    Payment.PaymentTypeId 
    Payment.Status 
    Preference
    This class will allow you to charge your customers through our web form from any device in a simple, fast and secure way.
    Preference.AutoReturn 
    Preference.OperationType 
    Preference.ProcessingMode 
    Refund
    This class will allow you to refund payments created through the Payments class.
    User
    Access the user
